Darts ×4, quarterstaff, long scimitar, backpack, bandages, winter blanket, chalk (piece), ink and quill, incendiary
oil, parchment ×5, hard leather pouch, soft leather pouch, iron rations (1 week), hemp rope (50-ft.), small
sack, tinderbox, torches ×3, wineskin (full), writing stick, spell book, and 1d4+1 gold pieces.
